SYSTEM: Ontologies-Methodology.pdf: P치gina 32
32
Ontology Requirements Specification. Task 7
출 Input: the groups of CQs written in natural 
language (obtained in task 5)
출 Objective: to give different levels of priority to 
the different groups of CQs, and within each group to 
the identified requirements (in the form of CQs) 
출 Output: a set of priorities attached to each group 
of CQs and to each CQ in a group
Within the SEEMP Reference Ontology specification we did 
not carry out this step. This means the first version of the 
ontology must be able to represent the knowledge contained 
in all the competency questions.
speaker: SYSTEM
